channel.title: Crash at the near end of Residue Processing
channel.description: Hey guys, I have a big problem, which is stopping me from reaching the next chapter "Questionable Ethics". At the near end of "Residue Processing" after you climbed up the ladder from the hazardous area with the barnacles at the ceiling I am walking towards the next Loading-Screen. It loads a few seconds but then crashes. "hl2.exe has stopped working". And then I am back on the desktop... I tried reinstalling, noclipping, mapchanging, nothing worked. Latest drivers are installed. Anybody the same crash or has someone a solving? I would really appreciate that. I am glad for every response. Below is the minidump-crash-file for that. System Specs: (Notebook) Hewlett Packard Pavilion 6108sg Intel i7 Core 2670QM CPU @ 2.20GHz 2.20GHz 6GB RAM 64-bit OS AMD Radeon HD 6490M 1GB VRAM hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T17_22_42C0.mdmp (127 KB)

item.title: Crash at the near end of Residue Processing
item.dc:creator: COLON
item.description:
Thank you. I believe I tried this before and it crashed while loading the map, but I am not entirely sure if I tried this map… But thanks for your reply

Read full topic

item.title: Crash at the near end of Residue Processing
item.dc:creator: 00cliffordj
item.description:
I had the same problem. If you don’t mind missing the very end of “Residue Processing” you can do what I did.

Go to ‘Settings’, ‘Keyboard’, ‘Advanced’ and activate ‘Enable developer console’.

Press the ` key whilst in game, type ‘sv_cheats 1’, to activate cheats. Then type ‘MAP c2a4h.bsp’ and it will load the start of “Questionable Ethics”.

Read full topic
item.source: Crash at the near end of Residue Processing

item.title: Crash at the near end of Residue Processing
item.dc:creator: COLON
item.description:
Hey guys,

I have a big problem, which is stopping me from reaching the next chapter “Questionable Ethics”. At the near end of “Residue Processing” after you climbed up the ladder from the hazardous area with the barnacles at the ceiling I am walking towards the next Loading-Screen. It loads a few seconds but then crashes. “hl2.exe has stopped working”. And then I am back on the desktop… I tried reinstalling, noclipping, mapchanging, nothing worked.
Latest drivers are installed.

Anybody the same crash or has someone a solving? I would really appreciate that.
I am glad for every response.
Below is the minidump-crash-file for that.

System Specs: (Notebook)

Hewlett Packard Pavilion 6108sg
Intel i7 Core 2670QM CPU @ 2.20GHz 2.20GHz
6GB RAM
64-bit OS
AMD Radeon HD 6490M 1GB VRAM
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T17_22_42C0.mdmp (127 KB)
